page.title: 04EDUCATION-N CREAKE
page.content: The primary school closed in the mid 1970's and children are bussed to a modern County Primary School at Burnham Market, 3 miles away. Children of the 11+ age-group travel daily to the comprehensive school at Wells-next-the-Sea, 5 miles away. A sixth-form centre is available at Fakenham, 7 miles away, with a daily bus service. The Norfolk College of Arts & Technology at Kings Lynn (22 miles away) offers a range of further education opportunities, and training in practical skills for the 16+ age-group. Students are collected by bus from the village. A varied selection of evening classes is available at all the mentioned centres, but no transport is provided. There are Public Libraries at Wells and Fakenham and a mobile library visits the village once a month.
